Constructor Detail

For

public For(Predicate predicate,
           Function f1,
           Function f2,
           Function newState)
Parameters:
predicate - the Predicate that determines whether f1 is called recursively
f1 - code to be executed if predicate returns true, general contract: has to return arguments for newState
f2 - code to be executed if predicate returns false
newState - computes new arguments for consequent call of f1

main

public static void main(String[] args)
